alert.note: Alert for Bureau; Henry; Putnam (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 9:28PM CDT until July 28 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Putnam County in north central Illinois... Southeastern Henry County in northwestern Illinois... Southern Bureau County in north central Illinois... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 928 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Geneseo to Viola, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kewanee, Princeton, Cambridge, Hennepin, Geneseo, Spring Valley, Galva, Henry, DePue, Granville, Wyanet, Atkinson, Sheffield, Annawan, Tiskilwa, Woodhull, Dalzell, Andover, Buda and Bureau Junction. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
